name: Fill Up Fridge - Organize Game
description:
Shopping is great, but when your fridge is facing the cluttered baskets of supermarket loot, is it okay?
Put all kinds of food and beverages in the refrigerator according to your way.
Your goal is to stuff everything into the fridge.
Drag the item up and put it in the refrigerator, you can click the item to rotate.

Once you've found the perfect spot to sort and organize your refrigerator, you'll feel more relaxed than ever before!
publishers: Wuhan Happy Bubble Information Technology Co
